website_summaries.verdict: Mounting kit 2-pack that fits the PlayStation 4 DualShock controller, as well as controllers from other consoles.
pros: If you trust 3M adhesive, this set of 2 controller mounts is a great option that is easy to install
Customers praise these holders for fitting the DualShock 4 controller perfectly despite being designed for a variety of controllers
cons: The wall needs to be well cleaned or the 3M adhesive may give out
Not as reliable as mounts that screw into the wall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I've purchased multiple sets of the controller mounts and the headset mounts. It's totally transformed my husband's gaming cabinent. Have had zero issue with the command strips coming off in fact everything is so sturdy that you can semi slam the cabinent door with the controllers mounted on them and they won't fall off! Super easy to attach. I did get a little OCD with alignment for our specific use but total installation time for all five mounts was about ten minutes with all my measurements. As an added bonus I think they look really sleek and modern. Highly recommend for your gaming storage and organization.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Great idea and product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product nice design and well built have boughton multiple holders and will be buying more. Customer service is 1st class. If you have any questions there Jonny on the spot.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy F.

customer_reviews.title: Battle Stations!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these stands. They look great in the wall. My battle station is ready!!
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Works Great and Fits Xbox One, PS4 and Switch Pro controllers perfectly.4 Just make sure to clean the wall prior to attaching. They Give you 4 pieces of double sided tape, just in case. Plus its a pretty good value for 2.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: If you are a gamer this is a must!
customer_reviews.text: This Controller Wall Stand is a must if you or someone you know is a gamer. My son has multiple controllers. Two of them are usually on a charging stand and one is in use. When he is done, one is just left sitting somewhere. Now with this Wall Holder, it has a home. Two of them come in the pack and the 3M adhesive is very strong. Just follow the instructions and do not use them for 24 hours after you put them up to let the adhesive set. Along with these we also purchased the Wall Holder for his headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Addict

customer_reviews.title: careful of the surface you place these on
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to install but not easy to remove. I recommend not placing this product on a painted wall and instead place it on a metal or wood surface like the side of a desk or cabinet. Otherwise the product works great. The above picture was taken after holding a hot hair dryer to the adhesive for 10 minutes. The heat instead weakened the top layer of the wall. If this product had an easier way to remove the product I would buy again. If you are renting or planning to ever move to a new home I would avoid these. If you plan to stay at your current home forever, these will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ruvolo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, Elegant Storage Solution
customer_reviews.text: They do exactly what they say they do. Excellent product; would definitely buy again. Warning: the mounting kit that comes with these is _wicked-strong_! Once they’re on, they’re very difficult to remove without effing-up the drywall. Do yourself a favor: 1. Employ a good bubble-level when installing so they’re good & straight when done. 2. Be sure of the location on which you’re installing them. While the kit does come with extra mounting kit parts allowing you to remount them if you relocate or change your mind later, take it from your old buddy MetalChef: get it right the first time. They’re a Mother-Hubbard to remove without damaging the drywall.
customer_reviews.author: Billy G. Gruff

customer_reviews.title: Tidy and easy to find
customer_reviews.text: Love these hangers. Used for controllers and headsets. Put them up a couple of weeks ago and everything is still hanging!
customer_reviews.author: brainstaples

customer_reviews.title: Really cool. I got 4 of them.
customer_reviews.text: Very tough and pro-looking. It comes with M3 adhesive, which sticks very strongly to my wall (drywall) right away. It also comes with some cord guides, which allow you to charge your controllers cleanly. Nifty! The ONLY thing to keep in mind is, this IS a beta product, and no where on the store listing does it SAY that it is a beta product. I'm not really upset, but I DO feel like I was lied to. Slightly. Also, "OAPRIRE" is one of the dumbest brand names ever. Now I have it written all over my walls. Change it.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Wofford

customer_reviews.title: Almost 100% perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these things.. they are amazingly built.. and very modern looking.. I just wish there was rubber or some kinda grip material on the part the controller sits on.. not just smooth.. it holds the controllers just fine.. but I do notice my clumsy self is able to knock the controller out of the holder itself when I walk by them. Of course mine are attached to my lift top coffee table.. not everyone mounts their controllers like that, so not nearly as much traffic will pass them.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: To people saying the adhesive comes off.
customer_reviews.text: CLEAN YOUR SURFACES! I cleaned my mount, and the area where I was going to mount it at, with alcohol. Follow the instructions and doing a little more... Afterwards, I put the adhesive on the mount, and then put it on the side of my metal desk and held it with a lot of pressure for 10 seconds. I immediately put my Steelseries Stratus XL and Nvidia Gamepad on them, (Both are pretty heavy controllers) they've been stuck with no signs of peeling at all for about a week now... What I didn't see was, the instructions say leave it on for a day before putting a controller on... But, it worked out for me either way.
customer_reviews.author: Chyna

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a few weeks. It's super easy to install. You basically put heavy duty double sided tape (included) on the back of it, and place it wherever it suits you. I put both of my mounts under my desk to give my desk a less cluttered look. Holds my PS4 controllers perfectly. Would definitely recommend this product to anyone with multiple controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Wade F.

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: Nice, really useful for me being organized, so that I don't have to shove it in the drawer and have limited space in it, because of my controller and long usb cable is in there. Also I really love their headphone mount to :), totally recommend it, because it can be removed without ruining any wall or surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Prashnaveet. P

customer_reviews.title: Only 1  stayed mounted
customer_reviews.text: Mounted both onto a wall, very easy to install, but only 1 has stayed mounted. The other even though was mounted the same way and only about 6 inches away from the first has come off the wall. I will need to use another adhesive to re mount it. For the price I think it should work better, but when mounted they do look very good and hold the controllers well without much wobbling. I'll see how long this last
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Great Organizing Tool
customer_reviews.text: I’m trying to get better at cable management as well as getting things off my floor. I was constantly having my headset or controller falling over or end up on the ground. This was easy to install and makes organization easier. I ended up putting it on the side of my case in the event I decide to move the location of my pc. Pondering if I can use these for anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Seabiscuit

customer_reviews.title: Gaming wall mounts
customer_reviews.text: This was a good purchase for us. My husband was tired of not having a designated place to keep his remote controls and these mounts help to keep them within reach for the different gaming systems that he has. The surface that you stick your mounts on should be cleaned beforehand and you can only have one item for one mount. My husband tried to put his headset and a controller on one mount and the mount fell. Other than that though, I am happy with my purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kealohapau'ole

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed. Quick and easy install
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully designed. Quick and easy install, no screws needed. The shape is perfectly made so the triggers touch the wall and it makes the controller fit snug. Extra clip for your microphone to be hung on the wall next to it. Amazing, great purchase. I've had it for about 2 months and the adhesive tapes they gave to hold it to the wall are still holding strong. Even if they fell off today I'd be okay with 2 months, that's pretty good. New adhesive is cheap. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Barry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I already bought a few of these and I love them. They are pretty durable and looks super clean empty or filled. It doesn’t have to be just for a controller it could be used for headphones, to wrap Cords or for clothing. It’s a universal use but mainly this would give you a better look if you want to mount them on a wall to store your controllers or on the side of a desk.
customer_reviews.author: tony morris

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre for price
customer_reviews.text: It's alright, but there are much better ones out there for the price. Pros: -Durable, made with strong feeling plastic. -3m adhesive is strong Cons: -Very slippery. Probably the most frustrating thing is if I even bumped my controller a slight bit, it would go toppling over, falling off the stand. -Annoying white logo is bright and distracting, impossible to remove, I had to cover it with black electrical tape. -Harsh, sharp edges. I would really not recommend this product for this price, there are many more better quality options
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive unreliable, mounting fails.
customer_reviews.text: Sure, there are a number of variables that may cause adhesive based mounts to fail (surface texture, temperature, installation). Regardless, I highly encourage hardware-based fasteners instead of these. I'll be buying a replacement. These continue to fail despite my effort to patiently adequately adhere them to my wall. If you have had better luck than I, great for your case.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Well done OAPRIRE!!!!! These controller mounts are awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these controller holders!! The price is very reasonable, they come in pairs, they are well designed, and they also work very well with my PS4 controllers or my Xbox One controllers!! Another bonus to purchasing the Oaprire controller holders is that, they are very easy to mount by using very good 3m double sided tape, which is also included in the box, so that there is no drilling or damaging being done to your walls!! These controller mounts are definitely a great way to unclutter your gaming space, and also helps you display your limited edition controller!! I honestly will be purchasing more of these controller mounts in the future as my game setup continues to grow!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They save you space and look cool
customer_reviews.text: I had a dilemma between desktop stands and these for your controllers. I chose this because they save space, they look cool and they are cheaper than buying individual stands (10 buck each). These stands also come with rubber cable clips for cable management. I don't think they are necessary buy they come in the package. One thing I don't like so much is that they are not a perfect fit for PS4 controllers as the controller rests a little loose on the stand. On the other hand, They are a perfect fit for xbox one controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Sleek & Strong
customer_reviews.text: Once mounted, these holders are extremely strong sticking & will not shift. They can hold alot of weight. 3 months after mounting we decided to paint and we were able to remove the holders by heating with a hair dryer to soften the two way tape. They popped off with no damage to the wall or shelves. The original tape peeled off easy & we were able to remount after purchasing new two way foam.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Berent

customer_reviews.title: Easy install!!!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install! The adhesive strips used for mounting seem to work very well. I’m kind of scared what will happen when they need to be removed. We’ll cross that bridge when we get there. I almost considered not getting these because of the bold branding. The branding is a sticker that comes separate in the box! I was happy about that. I left them off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Controller Wall Mount.
customer_reviews.text: I was kinda skeptical at first about the wall mount especially since it uses tape to mount it. The quality of the mount it top notch and easy to install. The tape on the wall is exceptionally strong. You can fit any controller on the mount and looks really good. Those that have a controller collection this is the absolute best wall mount to use.
customer_reviews.author: W. Amerson

customer_reviews.title: Great design, look and feel
customer_reviews.text: Great design, look and feel. The material is sturdy and the product is very useful. The only problem is that I've only had it up for a couple days and everything has fallen off the wall at least once. The adhesive is not sticking to the wall very well apparently. We were sure to wipe the surface down and let it dry before sticking it on, as well as holding it in place for 30 seconds. The worst offender of not sticking is the cord holder nub. If these items would stay on the wall I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: David R

customer_reviews.title: Good controller hanger
customer_reviews.text: These are just about perfect, able to properly hold a Xbox One, 360, PS4 Dual shock, and Switch controllers easily. Getting the cord management adhesives was a nice bonus too. Really, the only negative is the gaudy printed "OAPRIRE" label right smack dab in the middle. Seriously, you couldn't have made this smaller, or put it on the back side?
customer_reviews.author: Gadgethound

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable/durable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I let them sit for the recommended 24+ hours, and I wiped down the area and made sure it was dry before sticking onto the wall. I was very excited to have my controllers/headsets organized nicely. But within the first 4 hours of them holding my items, I was abruptly woken up throughout the night 3 different times because 3 of the 6 wall mounts peeled right off, causing 2 of my controllers, and one headset to fall with them as well. And to make things worse, when one of the controllers fell, the left stick broke. Very upsetting, and overpriced item.
customer_reviews.author: Monika Miramontes

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even last a Day with the controller on it. I let it cure for 24hrs as recommended and then put the controller on it and left the house for maybe 3hrs to come back and find it snapped in two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product set of 2 mini brackets were good and finishing was nice to
customer_reviews.text: The product set of 2 mini brackets were good and finishing was nice to, as per included sticky i pasted it on wall and start putting my controller on it but yesterday i heard a voice and then saw my controller on floor and the bracket sticky is weakening or no more sticky. That just add disappointment to this wonderful pair of mini handy brackets. I would recommend this product but put a caution mark to have extra stickys or efficient mounting kit. All postinf the pictues.
customer_reviews.author: Zain Zaidi

customer_reviews.title: Great Accessory
customer_reviews.text: Liked these so much I bought them again for my son's PS4. They work great. Super easy to install. They hold up great. I do wanna mention being aware to let them sit for a day before putting on the controllers on there. The other thing I did with mine is paint in the logo in black. For me, it stood out too much. I don't mind a logo but I prefer it to be more subtle.
customer_reviews.author: JP Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Great item, but heads up
customer_reviews.text: This item is great the 3M adhesive is great quality and sticks perfectly only complaint but I can live with it is the brand sticker on these mounts. They cant be seen when the controllers are mounted. Works great with PS4 or XBOX controller. The two wire holders are a great additions as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Really great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, simple, and looks sleek on your wall! Only issue I have with it is I would suggest using different adhesive pads for the wall because the ones they give you are very strong and did damage to my wall when I had to take them down while moving!
customer_reviews.author: Walker A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Install. Versatile.
customer_reviews.text: DID NOT WORK ON MY N64 CONTROLLER! ZERO STARS!!! Just Kidding. Was a snap to install. Works for most modern style controllers. I mostly own Nintendo controllers but it worked for: Wii U Pro Controller; Power A Switch Controller; Wii Classic Pro Controller; Logitec Gamepad F310 (Dual Shock knock off). Sorta worked for: Gamecube Controller; SNES Controller; NES Controller. In the Nope Catagory: N64 controller (not that I expected it to).
customer_reviews.author: Peter A. Belanger

customer_reviews.title: Terrible adhesive!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed these at first and as a result I bought three sets of these. The only issue I had with them at first was the chemical smell that came from these items. Then after a few weeks the big issue started happening, the adhesive started failing. One of my Nintendo switch controllers took a hard fall from the adhesive failing and no longer holds charge and the joy stick drifts. Be careful in trusting your expensive controllers to falling mounts.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Awesome if you don’t want to take it off and move it :(
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of these, one I bought about a week ago (And I really enjoyed them) and one a couple days ago. I mounted the second set today and noticed on of them was mounted a little to high so I decided to take it off a couple hours later and this is the result. The product is designed very nice and sticks to the wall really good just be sure you know exactly where you want it before you put in on your wall.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: Works well for both controllers and headsets or even both at the same time. The mount stickers work great and haven't had any problems whatsoever. Completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: David baker

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: To be clear, these are very thick plastic and seem of quality. I did think they were a little over priced but I gave them a try. I followed the directions which were clear but when I put my controller on the next day, I heard a crash. My controller was on the floor and so was this holder. It pulled the paint and plaster off the wall as well. I returned it but now I have to patch this mess!
customer_reviews.author: RAVN

customer_reviews.title: Great product will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for something so he can put here has remotes on the wall. The remote kept falling off the bunk bed and onto the floor and I was afraid I was going to get damaged. So far it's working pretty good and to boot this product came with two so we are able to hang the headphones on it as well
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I like them!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a relatively inexpensive way to store my xbox controllers. I use them for PC gaming and i like to have a clean desk. These were super easy to set up & use and once I figured where i wanted them I couldn't be happier w/ the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: great product, sticks well
customer_reviews.text: Excuse the messy picture. But it works perfectly fine. I have taken moved it once or twice too. It holds firmly. I did not have enough space, now I do
customer_reviews.author: Kamran

customer_reviews.title: Simple and perfect
customer_reviews.text: I dont have alot of space on my current desk since I have 5 different consoles, a large TV, plus other accessories. So I'm limited on space. These are a godsend, simple and great. The adhesive holds a ps4 and xbox controller with little to no wiggle room. Just right.
customer_reviews.author: SYXX

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, which it would have optional drill mounts for stability, but these seem to sick on very well. Also a bonus that it comes with extra tape so it can be moved and used again.
customer_reviews.author: ERIC

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: It's just what I need for my Switch pro controller. It didn't have something to hold to controller tightly so it will fall if something or someone bumps the controller. I did my research so I was aware of that so I'm not omitting one star for that.
customer_reviews.author: red october

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have not issues with these since installed. I have controllers on it 24 / 7 and it works great. Stay attached to the surface with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Elvis Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Does what you want it to do.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say but it holds the controllers nicely. I elected to use the provided adhesive as it simply stuck to my wall better than some quick release brands. No issues at all. Pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tom HightowerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: love them i have a lot of pics up under as xbox one s and the headseat
customer_reviews.text: Space organize no damage will happen i had up for a long long time thank u for making this Products come in make one for the keyboard and mouse now please thank you so much I love your products
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These are great space savers and a great way to display/store your controllers by making use of wall space that usually goes unused. I placed them on the side of my computer desk and they look great. Definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Works great with multiple systems
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of the mount. We have an Xbox and PS4 controller and two different types of head pieces and they all fit great. The Xbox controller fits the best out of the two controllers with the design but the PS4 fits well and I have no concerns of it falling off. I bought a pair about three months ago and just reordered another pair for our set of headsets also. They work great and I’m excited to have this product for organization.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I actually bought two sets. One for my controllers and another for headphones. These handy wall holders are excellent and durable. Plus the adhesive is really strong. I would highly recommend getting this!!
customer_reviews.author: Redstar

customer_reviews.title: works but permanent
customer_reviews.text: works fine, tape is super strong, however even using a scraper was not able to relocate without breaking, once its up its not going anywhere make sure you like where it is
customer_reviews.author: Gormph

customer_reviews.title: Over 1 year and still strong!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has not budged and it has been installed for 1 year and 2 months. I love the simple and sleek design. A xbox controller looks great floating. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Ehsen

customer_reviews.title: Organization
customer_reviews.text: I love the sturdiness of it, it’s a great addition to my living room. No more leaving my Xbox controllers anywhere, they have their own spot.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very good standard size. Holds switch pro controller and xbox very well. Not to mention looks super rad with controllers on the walls
customer_reviews.author: TtvJessewFL

customer_reviews.title: Great product all around
customer_reviews.text: This product holds great! It holds every controller I have even with the paddles on. We hung these over our beds so we can game until we sleep and not wake up with a lost controller. I have bought 3 packs so far and I might need more. These are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: hartman912

customer_reviews.title: Good for managing controllers/headsets and cables.
customer_reviews.text: These holders are pretty useful for keeping your controller, headset and cables neatly stored. I have one placed on the back of my monitor to keep my headset and I have the other one free since I can actually use it to hold my phone on a table or desk.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Perez

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: For $15, this is way way overpriced. I had a different expectation in the quality and design. Should be around $6 to be a more fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Wade X

customer_reviews.title: Screw mounting option would be a safer Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Adhesive sucks but they hold the Nintendo switch controllers nicely. One of them gave out & nearly hit my tv screen & could have broken my controller. Would recommend a screw mount option. To fix the issue I applied Heavy duty velcro to the back.
customer_reviews.author: Jolicee0310

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are great, I keep one attached to my desk for my daily and a few more on a wall shelf to keep my extras stashed away. Before they were just sitting on my desk or in a drawer so I may be biased because of how happy I am to have them off my desk in general, but as of now I have zero complaints about these. The adhesive is solid, the controller sits comfortably, and they look good. Great price point as well
customer_reviews.author: Sam Putnam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My 8yo got an xbox for Christmas. I knew my 20 month old would be all over the console and controllers so I bought these handy wall mount holders. They work great!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: They are good quality and our son loves having his controllers hanging on the wall next to his Xbox.
customer_reviews.author: ChiefTeacher

customer_reviews.title: Amazing...
customer_reviews.text: Love these holders... second time purchasing... stick them to the wall and display your xbox controller and hang you headsets to show off... They are made of shiny black plastic... and weigh next to nothing... and you get 2 of them which is amazing... cant go wrong with these...
customer_reviews.author: Hector Bribiesca

customer_reviews.title: Great Way to Clean Up Your Gaming Space!
customer_reviews.text: These wall mounts are an awesome way to clean up your controllers. I have my PS4, Switch Pro, and XBox controllers on these and they hold all three just perfectly. The best part is that these are adhesive rather than screw in mounts which was why I decided to go this route. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TKrames

customer_reviews.title: As advertised very neat
customer_reviews.text: As advertised very neat very easy to install will be buying another set for my gamer PC
customer_reviews.author: Peter F P

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Work as expected. Hold my Xbox controller without problem. If you are trying to make all your gaming devices looks organized, this is the one you are looking for. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I bought these! They give a nice look to hang our controllers for the xbox in our living room!
customer_reviews.author: Krys

customer_reviews.title: works pretty good
customer_reviews.text: i had one come broken in the package probably because of the transportation but the other one works great.
customer_reviews.author: monea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as planned. Fast delivery (is that really a selling point anymore?) and the bonus gifts were awesome! I'm ordering another set just for the bonus gifts! LOL
customer_reviews.author: PsychatTheGray

customer_reviews.title: GAME CHANGER
customer_reviews.text: These are a LIFE SAVER. My husband is a serious gamer and these are perfect for all his controllers. They work with all types of controllers, and look pretty cool once on the wall. Easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Piece
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my setup, holds the controllers nicely and easy to charge while they are on it. I also bought the headset holder and it works really good. Overall great products and no complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Skylar Uribe

customer_reviews.title: Work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I got these so I would have a nice way to display and keep organized my controllers. They work as advertised. I have had them about 3 months now, I used the adhesive to put them on my wall. The adhesive is still going strong on all of them with the controllers being displayed. If I get more controllers, I will definitely be getting more of these. Very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ketexan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Protects controllers from damage when not in use.
customer_reviews.text: My son, age 11, loves them! He hung them up himself and it keeps his controllers off the floor or desk when he and his friends aren’t playing. This way they have much less of a chance of getting damaged. It was a smart purchase and an awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: Pure Awesomeness!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing and a half. I love it. It took me forever to review, I've been busy. Finally here to say, if you have a gaming console this is a MUST HAVE! You can mount your controllers and headsets to save space and have a great looking gaming area. It looks cool guys. I'm really happy with this purchase and will purchase it again for more controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Needs a hole for a screw to mount more securely
customer_reviews.text: These are great but they do not stick very well and eventually fall off your drywall. They would be so much better if they had a screw hole in them.
customer_reviews.author: joseph morea

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Get two holders for a fraction off the cost of one of the "expensive other" brands out there. Does the job well and this product needs no drilling.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: simple, sturdy, and sleek
customer_reviews.text: went looking for a simple, minimalistic mount for my xbox controller to free up some desk space; and this one checked all the boxes. The adhesive feels sturdy on the wall, the brand name isn't overly "in your face" you can only see it when there is no controller mounted. Just a great little display piece to compliment anyone's gaming area/office space
customer_reviews.author: the dew

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Keeps the controllers out of my toddler’s reach
customer_reviews.author: nonchalanthippo

customer_reviews.title: Ultra strong hold
customer_reviews.text: Industrial stick to the wall. These suckers won’t be coming off and hold my Xbox 360 controllers to the wall very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Comes with extras.
customer_reviews.text: It comes with extra adhesive and two adhesive cord organizers.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID MELENDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Clutter freeeeee
customer_reviews.text: This worked out perfectly. It is not cluttering my desk any more. And getting the charging cable is fast and easy with the cable guide it came with, Bonus!
customer_reviews.author: HECTOR AKA GHOSTSERGEANT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Loved it my kids Xbox controls fit perfect. Now I don’t have to worry about them being left in the floor and getting stepped on.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. The holders mountbeasily and quickly, are the correct size for both ps4 and Xbox one controllers. They are also easy to clean and do not slide or otherwise move once the mounting has set. I do recommend waiting the full 24 hours of drying time before putting a controller on them though.
customer_reviews.author: April Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and it works
customer_reviews.text: Adheres easily to the wall is in ready to use. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Casperson

customer_reviews.title: Controller mount ps4/xbox
customer_reviews.text: Come with sticky tape, while installing second 1 I bumped first with elbow, it dropped and broke. Would prefer a screw mount to sticky tape
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: It was the perfect addition to our LAN setup for the controllers. We used a little Velcro underneath the part that’s flat so it’s more stabilized on the table then it works even better.
customer_reviews.author: Jaye

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep controllers out of baby's hands!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps our controllers up and out of the hands of our mobile and very destructive baby!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Maestro

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's suppose to do
customer_reviews.text: 3m adhesive strip works. Best bang for your buck. 2 controller holders for $13. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: OnlyBuilt4CubanLinx

customer_reviews.title: WORTHLESS! Fell off in less than two weeks
customer_reviews.text: I applied the mount exactly as instructed, left it hanging for 24 hours without holding anything. Within less than two weeks, with very little use, the whole thing fell off the wall. It's completely useless. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Gil Trevizo

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I used one to hold an XBox One controller and the other to hold a Turtle Beach headset. Works great. The only thing I dont like is the large print right in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Leo R.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job it's meant to do and works with other wireless controllers, too!
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this for my Steam controller, and it works quite well for it as well as for Xbox One controllers. Very solid grip and it holds the controller snugly. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Buchmann

customer_reviews.title: Bad adhesive
customer_reviews.text: Worked great when I just got them but a couple weeks later they start to falling Off
customer_reviews.author: Shoy

customer_reviews.title: This isn't for everyone
customer_reviews.text: These are very good, makes holding a controller look nice. the only problem with this is, the sticky pad that comes included is REALLY STICKY. i tried to get it off and it peeled off paint from the wall. It's very heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos J. Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for to corral the cords
customer_reviews.text: My son has multiple gaming consoles and the controller cords were constantly getting tangled up and caught by the robot vacuum. The simple design keeps everything organized.
customer_reviews.author: GGarland

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: Mounts work great. Have had em up on the wall for months without any signs of failing.
customer_reviews.author: Marciel

customer_reviews.title: Easy and works great
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and provide a minimalistic way to display/ charge your controller. I use one for my headset as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kappa1907

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. They are sturdy and we finally have a secure place to put all the controllers!
customer_reviews.author: Jessenia Zayas

customer_reviews.title: Sleek & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love these they keep my area looking clean and organized. I waited 24 hours before putting my controllers on them and they’re solid. I’ve bumped into them a few times with the controllers on there and neither the wall mounts or the controllers moved. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Helms

customer_reviews.title: Holds up good
customer_reviews.text: It holds my Xbox and PS4 controllers and sticks to wall pretty good

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for Gaming.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality. Feels sturdy and not cheap. Easy to install and is holding very well. Will buy more.

customer_reviews.title: Just how i want it to be
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. the quality is good and i had my PS4, Nvidia shield and xbox controller on it and never had an issue.

product_meta.title: Controller Stand Wall Holder Mount for Xbox One PS4 Pro - Pack of 2 OAPRIRE Acrylic Video Game Controller Accessories with Cable Clips - Black
product_meta.description:
DESIGN ORIGINAL INTENTION

For those with multiple game controller holder without enough desk space, looking for an apparatus to show off your special edition controllers, the high-quality OAPRIRE controller stand is the best choice.




PRODUCT FEATURES

1.Made to compatible a wide variety of different video game controllers: Xbox 360, Xbox one, Xbox one s, PS4, NVIDIA Shield, Amazon Fire TV Game controller and many more

2. Pets, small children, and beverages are not best friends with your expensive electronics, Wall mounting your controllers gives them a home that’s safe away from danger

3. Controller wall mount, Space-saving organization for your gaming area

4. Show off important Xbox one accessories for your custom controllers

5. Each controller holder has 2 adhesive strips, Same 3M adhesive GoPro uses

6. Controller stand has cool colors: Jet Black (High process requirements)

7. Cable clips can be used for corded controllers




PACKAGE CONTENT

✓2 x OAPRIRE Game Controller Stand (Controller Is NOT Included)

✓4 x 3M Adhesive Strips

✓2 x Cable Clips

✓1 x Manual




Tips: To ensure that you received an OAPRIRE branded product, Make sure you are purchasing ONLY from OAPRIRE.If you have any issues, please contact us so we can make it right.

ABOUT OAPRIRE

OAPRIRE sell a variety of innovative quality products, Share your excellence, technology, fun and easy lifestyle with you.
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY: Controller stand is made of sterling quality acrylic, with high toughness and fall resistance, Each controller holder USES 3M tape, which needs to be installed on a flat surface and after 24 hours, the max weight is 4 pounds

STABILITY&COMPATIBILITY: Professional for the xbox one ps4 switch pro controller design, keeps the controllers perfectly centered and balanced to keep controller safe from scratching and dropping. Made to compatible a wide variety of different video game controllers
EASY INSTALLATION: Simple and easy to install with no damage and no mess, No tools and no holes in your walls. Each controller holder has 2 tapes attached and cable clips

SPACE SAVING: Controller wall mounted installation to take advantage of unused wall space, Our controller stand gives your controller set place in your games room, This is the perfect way to display your custom controllers on the wall

WORRY-FREE PURCHASE: Universal compatible with the most controller and retro controller, Each OAPRIRE controller stand encounters problems in use can get a 24-hour response and solution customer service, If you care about style, quality and versatility this controller holder is the best choice.
